name: tail-whip
effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.
